document_title: Insecure Direct Object Reference vulnerability in the FortiPresence GUI for getting a portal

note.text: Two authorization bypass through user-controlled key vulnerabilities in the FortiPresence administration interface may allow an attacker to gain access to some user data via portal manager or portal users parameters.
note.title: Summary

note.text: Please upgrade to FortiPresence 20.1 or above.Starting in 2020, FortiPresence will employ a new version syntax.
note.title: Solutions

acknowledgment.description: Fortinet is pleased to thank SI9INT for reporting this vulnerability under responsible disclosure.

vulnerability.title: Insecure Direct Object Reference vulnerability in the FortiPresence GUI for getting a portal
